explanation: [0-0] A brown male lion is on yellow grassland with its back to the camera, with a background of red soil.

[0-3] At this moment, there is a crocodile under the lion, and they are fighting. The crocodile is trapped by the lion in the grass on the shore. The male lion bites the crocodile's head firmly. An animal icon appears in the upper right corner of the screen.

[3-6] Then the screen switches to a close-up of the crocodile, its body shaking and falling to the ground, and the surrounding grass shaking along with it.

[9-16] Then the picture switches to the crocodile lying on the ground. Several lions are eyeing the crocodile eagerly. The male lion presses the crocodile's back with its claws and attacks the crocodile again. The crocodile turns its head and opens its mouth, scaring the lions away. Finally, the picture switches to a male lion lying on the grass and roaring up to the sky. The afterglow of the setting sun shines on its mane, making it look particularly mighty and majestic.
